title: How to Make a Spy Gadget to Grab Things With

steps.headline: Get some string, some paint, and a box or can.
steps.description: The color of paint should match the area the spy gadget will be in so that the box can blend in. If the box doesn't blend in, someone will see it.

steps.headline: Paint the can or box.
steps.description: You'll need to let the paint dry before proceeding to the next steps. Note: Painting the box is an optional step that you don't need to do. However, it's a recommended step because if you paint the box, it'll blend in better.

steps.headline: Tie the string around the can or box.
steps.description: Make sure the string is tied very tight because if it isn't, the string will fall off the can/box when you try to use the Grabbing Spy Gadget.

steps.headline: Get some binoculars.
steps.description: You don't need them to make the Grabbing Spy Gadget, but they're a good thing to use. If you don't have them, it's okay too.

steps.headline: Hide yourself in a high place.
steps.description: On a balcony, and in the attic are all good suggestions. You need to be high up so that no one sees you while you use your gadget.

steps.headline: Move the string so the can/box can scoop up what you want to get.
steps.description: You will probably need some practice to do this, though, because you will need to tilt the can/box sideways to get whatever you want inside.

steps.headline: Pull the can or box back up towards you.
steps.description: You should have your object inside the can/box. Be sure to hide whatever you grabbed, so that no one finds it.
